# Learn about API authentication here: https://plot.ly/ggplot2/getting-started # Find your api_key here: https://plot.ly/settings/api library(plotly) df <- data.frame(x = rnorm(1000)) ggplot(df, aes(x=x)) + geom_histogram(aes(y = ..density..), binwidth=density(df$x)$bw) + geom_density(fill="red", alpha = 0.2) ggplotly()
